name: Iraroji VOW
description:
Iraroji VOW is a collection of both traditional and color nonogram puzzles. The game contains 300 of these puzzles broken up by three difficulty levels in the following way:
  • 100 Elementary Level puzzles with both 15x15 and 20x20 grids
  • 100 Intermediate Level puzzles with just 20x20 grids
  • 100 Advanced Level puzzles with both 20x20 and 25x25 grids
The game also has a multiplayer mode for up to 4 players.
